name: D'Sparkplug
content: D'Sparkplug is a simple one page portfolio website powered by Gatsby.js and SASS.
metaDescription: D'Sparkplug portfolio website built by Adelana Onafuwa

name: Respay
content: Respay is a web app for a property management and payment solution firm.

I worked in a team of astute and adept developers in the development of this product. I was on the frontend team where I contributed to the production of Respay using React, CSS and quite a few other popular frontend end libraries.
Using my knowledge of JavaScript and frontend development, I was able to develop a few of the key features that makes the app tick.
metaDescription: Respay property management web app co-developed by Adelana Onafuwa

name: Github Profile
content: Developed using Typescript and React, Github Profile is an app that is powered by the Github API.
It allows users to search for registered Github users highlighting their profile details and also listing their most popular repositories sorted by number of stars.
features: Caching system which prevents duplicate requests to the Github API
metaDescription: Github user profile search app built by Adelana Onafuwa

name: WilmerFMCO
content: A single page portfolio website for The Wilmer Apartments based in Lagos, Nigeria that showcases brochures and video presentations of their apartment suites.
The website is powered by Gatsby.js and Styled Components.
features: Custom built carousel and video player
metaDescription: WilmerFMCO website built by Adelana Onafuwa

name: Adelana Onafuwa
content: This website. Built with Gatsby.js and SASS.
This website highlights details about me and showcases projects I have worked on.

name: Authentication App
content: A React app bootstrapped with Webpack and Babel. This authentication app shows how client side authentication works on a frontend app.
It is also connected to an Express REST API I built using axios for data fetching.
Users can sign in, sign out and sign up. Any generated token in the API response is saved to Local Storage and used to verify the user until the token is cleared from local storage on sign out.
metaDescription: A React client side authentication app bootstrapped with Webpack and Babel and connected to a REST API
